Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires investor-owned energy utilities publish on its customer-facing website both its promotional and educational materials
Summary: Enacts the "utility materials disclosure act" to require investor-owned energy utilities publish on its customer-facing website both its promotional and educational materials and file such materials with the public service commission.
LawCode: Add ยง28, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring investor-owned energy utilities publish on its customer-facing website both its promotional and educational materials
